recipesJson.name: More Donuts Please
recipesJson.author: wh1skeyk1ng
recipesJson.description: Simple donut recipe yielding great results with CAP Glazed & some company.  Give it 2 weeks steep and enjoy this sweet gooey batch of subtly spiced glazed donuts.  Works with CAP FV v2 after 3 weeks.  No need to worry about Play-Doh taste after this gets a little steep.
